name: v1.0.3
body:
## MODULE.bazel

Feel free to pick only the toolchains you need. Default toolchains are provided, but registering them is optional (especially when using custom toolchains)

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_arm_gnu", version = "1.0.3")

arm_toolchain = use_extension("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:extensions.bzl", "arm_toolchain")

arm_toolchain.arm_none_eabi()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "arm_none_eabi")
register_toolchains("@arm_none_eabi//toolchain:all")

arm_toolchain.arm_none_linux_gnueabihf()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "arm_none_linux_gnueabihf")
register_toolchains("@arm_none_linux_gnueabihf//toolchain:all")

arm_toolchain.aarch64_none_elf()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "aarch64_none_elf")
register_toolchains("@aarch64_none_elf//toolchain:all")

arm_toolchain.aarch64_none_linux_gnu()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "aarch64_none_linux_gnu")
register_toolchains("@aarch64_none_linux_gnu//toolchain:all")
```


## WORKSPACE

<details>

<summary> WORKSPACE contents </summary>

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:git.bzl", "git_repository")

git_repository(
    name = "rules_cc",
    remote = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_cc",
    branch = "main",
)

git_repository(
    name = "arm_none_eabi",
    remote = "https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_arm_gnu",
    branch = "master",
)

# Toolchain: arm-none-eabi
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "arm_none_eabi_deps")
arm_none_eabi_deps()
register_toolchains("@arm_none_eabi//toolchain:all")

# Toolchain arm-none-linux-gnueabihf
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "arm_none_linux_gnueabihf_deps")
arm_none_linux_gnueabihf_deps()
register_toolchains("@arm_none_linux_gnueabihf//toolchain:all")

# Toolchain aarch64-none-elf
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "aarch64_none_elf_deps")
aarch64_none_elf_deps()
register_toolchains("@aarch64_none_elf//toolchain:all")

# Toolchain aarch64-none-linux-gnu
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "aarch64_none_linux_gnu_deps")
aarch64_none_linux_gnu_deps()
register_toolchains("@aarch64_none_linux_gnu//toolchain:all")
```

</details>



## What's Changed
* [SPEC] nano spec test by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_arm_gnu/pull/56
* Fix cpp stdlib include error by @dbenusov in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_arm_gnu/pull/57

## New Contributors
* @dbenusov made their first contribution in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_arm_gnu/pull/57

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_arm_gnu/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3

name: v1.0.2
body:
## MODULE.bazel

Feel free to pick only the toolchains you need. Default toolchains are provided but registering them is optional (especially when using custom toolchains)

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_arm_gnu", version = "1.0.2")

arm_toolchain = use_extension("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:extensions.bzl", "arm_toolchain")

arm_toolchain.arm_none_eabi()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "arm_none_eabi")
register_toolchains("@arm_none_eabi//toolchain:all")

arm_toolchain.arm_none_linux_gnueabihf()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "arm_none_linux_gnueabihf")
register_toolchains("@arm_none_linux_gnueabihf//toolchain:all")

arm_toolchain.aarch64_none_elf()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "aarch64_none_elf")
register_toolchains("@aarch64_none_elf//toolchain:all")

arm_toolchain.aarch64_none_linux_gnu()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "aarch64_none_linux_gnu")
register_toolchains("@aarch64_none_linux_gnu//toolchain:all")
```


## WORKSPACE

<details>

<summary> WORKSPACE contents </summary>

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:git.bzl", "git_repository")

git_repository(
    name = "rules_cc",
    remote = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_cc",
    branch = "main",
)

git_repository(
    name = "arm_none_eabi",
    remote = "https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_arm_gnu",
    branch = "master",
)

# Toolchain: arm-none-eabi
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "arm_none_eabi_deps")
arm_none_eabi_deps()
register_toolchains("@arm_none_eabi//toolchain:all")

# Toolchain arm-none-linux-gnueabihf
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "arm_none_linux_gnueabihf_deps")
arm_none_linux_gnueabihf_deps()
register_toolchains("@arm_none_linux_gnueabihf//toolchain:all")

# Toolchain aarch64-none-elf
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "aarch64_none_elf_deps")
aarch64_none_elf_deps()
register_toolchains("@aarch64_none_elf//toolchain:all")

# Toolchain aarch64-none-linux-gnu
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "aarch64_none_linux_gnu_deps")
aarch64_none_linux_gnu_deps()
register_toolchains("@aarch64_none_linux_gnu//toolchain:all")
```

</details>



## What's Changed
* [BAZEL] make tools native binaries by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_arm_gnu/pull/51
* [GCC] default to latest version by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_arm_gnu/pull/52
* Support linkmap generation feature by @FaBrand in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_arm_gnu/pull/53
* [RENAME] toolchains_arm_gnu by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_arm_gnu/pull/54

## New Contributors
* @FaBrand made their first contribution in https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_arm_gnu/pull/53

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hexdae/toolchains_arm_gnu/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2

name: v1.0.1
body:
## MODULE.bazel

Feel free to pick only the toolchains you need. Default toolchains are provided
with  but registering them
is optional (especially when using custom toolchains)

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_arm_gnu", version = "1.0.1")

arm_toolchain = use_extension("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:extensions.bzl", "arm_toolchain")

arm_toolchain.arm_none_eabi()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "arm_none_eabi")
register_toolchains("@arm_none_eabi//toolchain:all")

arm_toolchain.arm_none_linux_gnueabihf()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "arm_none_linux_gnueabihf")
register_toolchains("@arm_none_linux_gnueabihf//toolchain:all")

arm_toolchain.aarch64_none_elf()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "aarch64_none_elf")
register_toolchains("@aarch64_none_elf//toolchain:all")

arm_toolchain.aarch64_none_linux_gnu()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "aarch64_none_linux_gnu")
register_toolchains("@aarch64_none_linux_gnu//toolchain:all")
```


## WORKSPACE

<details>

<summary> WORKSPACE contents </summary>

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:git.bzl", "git_repository")

git_repository(
    name = "rules_cc",
    remote = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_cc",
    branch = "main",
)

git_repository(
    name = "arm_none_eabi",
    remote = "https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi",
    branch = "master",
)

# Toolchain: arm-none-eabi
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "arm_none_eabi_deps")
arm_none_eabi_deps()
register_toolchains("@arm_none_eabi//toolchain:all")

# Toolchain arm-none-linux-gnueabihf
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "arm_none_linux_gnueabihf_deps")
arm_none_linux_gnueabihf_deps()
register_toolchains("@arm_none_linux_gnueabihf//toolchain:all")

# Toolchain aarch64-none-elf
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "aarch64_none_elf_deps")
aarch64_none_elf_deps()
register_toolchains("@aarch64_none_elf//toolchain:all")

# Toolchain aarch64-none-linux-gnu
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "aarch64_none_linux_gnu_deps")
aarch64_none_linux_gnu_deps()
register_toolchains("@aarch64_none_linux_gnu//toolchain:all")
```

</details>



## What's Changed
* [RELEASE] fix typo by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi/pull/47
* [GCC] aarch64-none-elf by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi/pull/48
* Adds aarch64_none_linux_gnu support by @makestuffwork in https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi/pull/49
* [AARCH64] update release by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi/pull/50

## New Contributors
* @makestuffwork made their first contribution in https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi/pull/49

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1

name: v1.0.0
body:
## MODULE.bazel

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_arm_gnu", version = "1.0.0")

arm_toolchain = use_extension("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:extensions.bzl", "arm_toolchain")

arm_toolchain.arm_none_eabi()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "arm_none_eabi")
register_toolchains("@arm_none_eabi//toolchain:all")

arm_toolchain.arm_none_linux_gnueabihf()
use_repo(arm_toolchain, "arm_none_linux_gnueabihf")
register_toolchains("@arm_none_linux_gnueabihf//toolchain:all")
```

## WORKSPACE

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:git.bzl", "git_repository")

git_repository(
    name = "rules_cc",
    remote = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_cc",
    branch = "main",
)

git_repository(
    name = "arm_none_eabi",
    remote = "https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi",
    branch = "master",
)

# Toolchain: arm-none-eabi
load("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:deps.bzl", "arm_none_eabi_deps", "arm_none_linux_gnueabihf_deps")
arm_none_eabi_deps()
register_toolchains("@arm_none_eabi//toolchain:all")

# Toolchain arm-none-linux-gnueabihf
arm_none_linux_gnueabihf_deps()
register_toolchains("@arm_none_linux_gnueabihf//toolchain:all")
```



## What's Changed
* [ARCHIVES] add separate bazel files by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi/pull/41
* [ARCHIVE] remove bin extension from the archives. by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi/pull/42
* [EXT] simplify version selection by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi/pull/43
* [CI] unify by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi/pull/44
* [TOOLCHAIN] use aliased repos by @hexdae in https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi/pull/45


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hexdae/bazel-arm-none-eabi/compare/v0.0.1...v1.0.0

name: v0.0.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_arm_gnu", version = "0.0.1")

# Toolchains: arm-none-eabi
arm_toolchain = use_extension("@toolchains_arm_gnu//:extensions.bzl", "arm_toolchain")
arm_toolchain.arm_none_eabi(version = "13.2.1")
use_repo(
    arm_toolchain,
    "arm_none_eabi",
    "arm_none_eabi_darwin_arm64",
    "arm_none_eabi_darwin_x86_64",
    "arm_none_eabi_linux_aarch64",
    "arm_none_eabi_linux_x86_64",
    "arm_none_eabi_windows_x86_64",
)

register_toolchains("@arm_none_eabi//toolchain:all")

# Toolchains: arm-none-linux-gnueabihf
arm_toolchain.arm_none_linux_gnueabihf(version = "13.2.1")
use_repo(
    arm_toolchain,
    "arm_none_linux_gnueabihf",
    "arm_none_linux_gnueabihf_linux_aarch64",
    "arm_none_linux_gnueabihf_linux_x86_64",
    "arm_none_linux_gnueabihf_windows_x86_64",
)

register_toolchains("@arm_none_linux_gnueabihf//toolchain:all")
```
